Title: Hunting Wolf
Descriptions:
Howdy, Partner, am I glad to see you!

I've had a special request for some pest control, but of the wolf variety.

There's been a pack of particularly vicious wolves terrorising the folks of the Bitterroot Country Club and this pack is led by the legendary Silver Ghost, a white wolf.

If you can wipe out the entire pack, you be doing the people of Bitterwood a great service, but taking out the Ghost, their leader should be enough to scatter the rest.

Bring me the white pelt and I'll pay you $600.

Straight shots, Partner!
Kill a White Wolf with Crossbow
Acquire a pristine White Wolf pelt
Kill a White Wolf with Crossbow
Acquire a pristine White Wolf pelt
ObjectiveText: Kill a White Wolf to collect Pelt
